content.p: The annual School of Education showcase proudly commences the Ganakumaran Subramaniam Education Showcase in April 2022. This year's theme, "Limitless: Education Beyond the Ordinary", focuses on the expansion of students' limitless artistries through creativity and innovation. As we shift from pandemic to endemic, we have globally geared education to reach beyond the ordinary. Thus, despite the odds, UNM School of Education stands strongly united in a diverse and inclusive network through the wonders of remarkable pedagogies. Please mark your calendar from 25 to 27 April 2022 for the Ganakumaran Subramaniam Education Showcase! telephone: +6 (03) 8725 3717 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8020
